The researcher, they thought, as you thought that God would not send one of the readers of the fans and agreed by Abu Jaafar by breaking the thunderbolt (and they).Ibn Amir, Hamza, Al -Kisaâ€™i, Hafs, and a successor, read the opening of the hammer on the adoption of what was presented in the saying of the Almighty (and it is the Almighty of our Lord [Al -Jin: 3].(P-226) The meaning: that a man of humanity thought that God does not send anyone, or that we believed that they thought as you thought, etc., that is: we believed in them.And the affirmation of the (broken or foolishness of the pace with the news of its intention.The resurrection bears the mission of the messengers and the mission of the mother to the wilderness, that is: He obtained a similar to them, obtained for you from the denial of sending the messengers.And this is about this in which there is an illusion of the partners that the corruption of their mastery is the world of mankind to the world of gin.And a sentence, as you think that they are opposite and its deeds, so it is permissible to be from the saying of the storyteller who says the gin, some of them.It is permissible to be from the words of God to the Almighty who is the one who is the one who has commanded his Messenger that he would say to them, and this direction is appointed if he said that he said: We heard [Jinn: 1] And (that) from his saying that there will be no light from the ethnic and its name is the guarantee of a deleted affair.A sentence will not send one of his news.And refining with the perception of the exile of the connotation that they were unanimous in the referral of the mission.
